Header: Ten fishermen missing in Northern Province sea- [photos]
Content: Ten fishermen who went fishing in the Northern Province has gone missing, Jaffna District Secretary N. Vedanayagam said. He said the group went missing yesterday. Meanwhile, an Indian fishing boat carrying six fishermen was swept to the Sri Lankan waters due to the adverse weather conditions in sea yesterday. They were taken into Jaffna police custody. Fishermen were advised not to go to sea today due to the prevailing bad weather. Pics by Vanni Romesh Madushanka
